Name: CHAIN SAW
About the game: This is the story of one man named John Young. Having got into an accident the main character wakes up in an incomprehensible place, and hears the ominous voice of a maniac. Who scoffs at the Protagonist, and calls for making the right choice, choosing one of 3 options for the path. What happens next depends only on you! In the game you will be expected: the right to choose, 4 endings of the game, 1 of them is positive. Maniac, which will suddenly appear. Black humor from the maniac and much more. Features • Puzzles - interesting not difficult puzzles that perfectly diversify the gameplay. • Non linearity of the plot - more than 3 ways to choose. • Modern graphics - high-quality graphics, which further conveys the atmosphere of the game. • Voice - quality voice. • Music - perfectly matched music, which will not leave you indifferent. • Forcing atmosphere - which will make you constantly turn around. • Black humor. • 4 game endings. • Great game level.
